p: A UHPLC high-resolution MS Dionex Thermo Scientific Ultimate 3000 system connected with a Thermo Q-Exactive focus machine was used. For the analysis, 2 mg per ml of lyophilized material was dissolved in methanol-distilled water (1:1 v/v) and 10 µl of filtered solution (PTFE filter) was injected in the instrument, with the specifications set as already informed ( Simirgiotis et al., 2016a).
